price: Awurade foforͻ biara nni hͻ gyesε Ɔno nko ara, Ɔma nkwa εna Ɔkum; (Ɔne) mo Wura Nyankopͻn ne moagyanom tetefoͻ no nso Wura Nyankopͻn no.
arabic: لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحۡيِۦ وَيُمِيتُۖ رَبُّكُمۡ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lā ilāha illā huwa yuḥ'yī wayumītu rabbukum warabbu ābāikumu al-awalīna
